channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Trump says the big Netflix-Warner Bros merger ‘could be a problem’ – here’s why
item.description: ‘Could be a problem’: Trump wants to personally help decide the Netflix-Warner Bros. Deal – and he’s already highlighted a big reason to block it.

item.title: Rachat de Warner Bros : Donald Trump met en garde Netflix
item.description: Donald Trump a l'intention de jouer un rôle dans le rachat de Warner Bros par Netflix. Le président a estimé que la fusion « pourrait être un problème après avoir reçu Ted Sarandos, l'un des PDG de Netflix, à la Maison Blanche. C'est un signal clair que le rachat s'annonce semé d'embûches…

item.title: Landman season 2 episode 4 proves why Monty had to die – even though Demi Moore ‘missed’ Jon Hamm while filming
item.description: Landman season 1 ended with the shock of Monty's death, but season 2 episode 4 proves why it needed to happen.

item.title: Voici la meilleure façon d’utiliser Google Agenda sur Windows 11
item.description: Astral permet aux utilisateurs sur Windows d'avoir accès à une application native pour gérer leur Google Agenda. Avec sa nouvelle version, l'application prend en charge le multicomptes et dévoile des options de visioconférences.

item.title: PC gaming is in big trouble – Dell and Lenovo’s hardware will reportedly get some major price hikes soon
item.description: Both casual PC users and gamers should be concerned, as Dell and Lenovo may be the next manufacturers to raise prices for PC hardware.

item.title: Apple Watch Series 11 drops $100 to an all-time low price
item.description: Sure, Black Friday and Cyber Monday have come and gone, but you can still find a last-minute deal on the best tech gifts. Take the Apple Watch Series 11, which has dropped to an all-time low of $299, from $399. The 25 percent discount is an even better deal than we saw on either of those sale holidays. We gave the Apple Watch Series 11 a score of 90 when it came out in September. That's thanks, in part, to an upgraded 24 hours of battery life — which lasted closer to a day and a half — compared to the 18 hours promised by the Series 10. It also features a thin, light design and a wrist flick ...

item.title: How the creator economy destroyed the internet
item.description: Jimmy Donaldson, better known as MrBeast, has the most popular YouTube account with over 450 million subscribers, or a little over 1 in 16 people in the world. His success with high-production, high-output stunt videos have made him the aspirational model for independent content creators everywhere: the actualization of the promise that, thanks to the […]...

item.title: Hinge’s new AI feature helps daters move beyond boring small talk
item.description: Hinge launched “Convo Starters,” a feature powered by AI that provides personalized tips for initiating meaningful conversations.

item.title: You can still get AirPods Pro 3 for their lowest-ever Black Friday price –no, I'm not joking
item.description: It's the Black Friday deal that keeps on going: save $30 on Apple's AirPods Pro 3

item.title: N’utilisez plus ce vélo électrique vendu par Decathlon et Nature & Découvertes : un défaut le rend dangereux, un rappel est en cours
item.description: AddBike lance une campagne de rappel visant l’ensemble des vélos cargo U-Cargo équipés d’une fourche rigide, commercialisés en France depuis 2020. Cette procédure fait suite à la détection d’un possible défaut de fabrication au niveau du cintrage des fourreaux de fourche, susceptible d’entraîner un risque de blessure pour l’utilisateur.

item.title: These quintuple-driver wired earbuds just landed for only $80 – and I want to know how
item.description: Who says audiophile-grade listening gear is too expensive? Astell & Kern’s affordable Activo arm just launched five-driver IEMs for $80

item.title: Your next job interview could be with an AI. Here’s how to nail it
item.description: An expert shares the secrets to success. Five years ago, an algorithm decided whether your résumé ever reached a recruiter. Now, it might be the one asking you the questions.

item.title: This popular Anker rival has just recalled a power bank due to a fire hazard – here’s what to do
item.description: Iniu has recalled some versions of its 10,000mAh power bank over reports of overheating and even fires.

item.title: « Abolir » l’UE et comparaison nazie : la riposte cinglante d’Elon Musk à l’amende de l’Europe
item.description: Riposte immédiate ? Au lendemain d'une amende de 120 millions d'euros pour non-respect du DSA, X a coupé le compte publicitaire de la Commission européenne. En parallèle, Elon Musk multiplie les insultes, comparant l'UE au régime nazi. La rupture est totale.

item.title: L’offre à saisir aujourd’hui, c’est ce pack Xiaomi 15T à prix cassé avec la Redmi Watch 5, une montre efficace avec GPS intégré
item.description: Même après le Black Friday, les bonnes affaires continuent ! Boulanger propose un pack très attractif réunissant le Xiaomi 15T et la Redmi Watch 5 pour seulement 449 euros au lieu de 699 euros. Une promotion idéale pour ceux qui veulent s’équiper (ou faire un beau cadeau) pile à temps pour Noël, sans faire exploser le budget.

item.title: SwitchBot crossed a smart lamp with a candle melter and it's the ultimate hygge gift for gadget fans who just want to get cozy
item.description: This flameless, smokeless candle melter lamp hooks up to your smart home and releases scents and a warm glow.

item.title: The Suri Sonic Electric Toothbrush is back to its lowest-ever Black Friday price
item.description: The Suri Sonic Electric Toothbrush is a great, eco-friendly electric toothbrush and it's available at a great price right now at Amazon.

item.title: Marre que Google récupère vos données ? Ce Linux Phone européen mise sur la vie privée
item.description: Jolla tente un retour sur le devant de la scène mobile avec un nouveau smartphone Sailfish OS, précommandable dès 99 euros dans plusieurs pays européens. Misant sur la confidentialité, la longévité logicielle et la réparabilité, le Jolla Phone se pose en alternative militante au duo Android/iOS.

item.title: ‘Five Nights at Freddy’s 2’ Has a Big Post-Thanksgiving Open
item.description: Blumhouse gets out another winner at the box office as the year winds down, while 'Zootopia 2' is just a short hop away from $1 billion.

item.title: Trump says if Netflix buys Warner Bros. its market share 'could be a problem'
item.description: After Netflix announced that it was acquiring Warner Bros. Discovery last week, observers immediatley wondered when or if the deal could obtain regulatory approval. Now, President Trump has made comments indicating that said approval is likely to take awhile if it happens at all, Bloomberg reported. "Well, that’s got to go through a process, and we’ll see what happens," Trump told reporters in a recent Q&A scrum. "But it is a big market share. It could be a problem." The President added that he will be personally involved in the approval process. As we pointed out last week, Netflix and HBO ...

item.title: Stop, Shop, and Scroll
item.description: In 1914 Joseph Pilates was sitting in a World War I-era internment camp watching his fellow inmates waste away when he had an idea. As he later recounted to a journalist, the skinny prison courtyard cats kept spry and limber, stretching and moving even as they starved — could the German citizens interned in the […]

item.title: JBL Grip Review: A Bluetooth Speaker With Lava Lamp Vibes
item.description: This waterproof ultra-portable comes with a splash of party.

item.title: OpenAI boasts enterprise win days after internal ‘code red’ on Google threat
item.description: ChatGPT Enterprise usage grew 8x year-over-year as workers report saving an hour daily, but OpenAI faces competitive pressure from Anthropic and questions about cost sustainability.

item.title: AKQA CEO Baiju Shah explains how the agency is leveraging AI instead of being disrupted by it
item.description: In his first extended interview since joining the company, the AKQA chief explains why he is bullish on the intersection of tech and creativity. Hello and welcome to Modern CEO! I’m Stephanie Mehta, CEO and chief content officer of Mansueto Ventures. Each week this newsletter explores inclusive approaches to leadership drawn from conversations with executives and entrepreneurs, and from the pages of Inc. and Fast Company. If you received this newsletter from a friend, you can sign up to get it yourself every Monday morning....

item.title: Want to drive the Wienermobile? Oscar Mayer is hiring 12 Hotdoggers for a year-long road adventure
item.description: From officiating weddings to appearing at major races, Hotdoggers carry on a long tradition of road-trip joy and Americana. If you’ve ever dreamed of sitting behind the wheel of a giant hot dog, then you’re in luck. Oscar Mayer’s Wienermobile is in need of Gen Z drivers known as “Hotdoggers,” as the company opens its applications. The iconic vehicle is about to roll into its 90th year. ...

item.title: I test coffee makers for a living, and these are the best Keurig machine deals you can grab today – with delivery for Christmas
item.description: Snag a Keurig coffee maker for a record-low price and watch your loved one's face light up when they unwrap it.

item.title: Tekken lead Katsuhiro Harada to leave Bandai Namco: 'I felt this was the most fitting moment to bring one chapter to a close'
item.description: As Tekken ends its 30th anniversary celebrations, series lead Katsuhiro Harada confirms he's leaving Bandai Namco.

item.title: The Streamer Awards 2025: IShowSpeed wins Streamer of the Year
item.description: This year's Streamer Awards gave nods to IShowSpeed, Kai Cenat, CaseOh, Caedrel, Cinna, PlaqueBoyMax, Emiru, and more.

item.title: Compacte et endurante, cette tablette Lenovo ne coûte pas plus de 100 € à l’approche de Noël
item.description: La Lenovo Tab One est une petite tablette idéale pour le streaming vidéo et la navigation web. Simple et efficace, elle est actuellement affichée à 99 euros au lieu de 168 euros sur le site officiel de la marque.

item.title: X fined $140 million for breaching EU rules, Elon calls for bloc abolition
item.description: The European Commission has fined X €120 million for three separate issues, including the blue checkmark.

item.title: Proton VPN launches "world’s first" VPN blanket – and gifts you with 1 month of free VPN protection
item.description: Proton VPN teamed up with luxury streetwear brand Aries to design a cosy anti-homesickness blanket. Here's how to get yours.
